credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Eric Kellenberger Collection, Switzerland and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
title: Schweizerische Stadtbau-Ausstellung (Swiss City Planning Exhibit)
description: A simply constructed three story building in the shape of a Z, signifying the Zurich museum is the single element of this poster; the only ornament is the lettering running over the flat roof. Executed in black, gray and blue with white lettering.
name: Poster
